title: Unable to connect to the login queue on NA server!!!!!!!!!!
body: I cannot  login and play! Do something Riot!!! Anyone else facing the issue?

replies.body:
Riot Adabard, I'm still having issues with my client saying "Unable to connect to the login queue..."

I have reinstalled the game 2 times and have followed what directions or quick fixes I could find on the threads.

I'm not sure what I should do.

I have been having this issue for several days

> This should now be resolved.

I was able to log into my account and play even during the maintenance issue. Honor Adabard for his quick response to the situation, but report CertainlyT.
